extendedInfo.description: by Glenn Corpes.** Please note that if you have a 2.3+ (Gingerbread or above) device, you may prefer the XHD version which is specially optimised and adds Stereoscopic 3D support (with 3D glasses) **** This version supports Glasses Free Stereo 3D for the LG Optimus 3D and Sharp devices that support Stereo 3D **Stunning visuals and a pumping sound track make this ground-breaking game the way perfect way to show off what your phone can do! Nominated last year for a Best App Ever Award on iPhone and was featured multiple times on the App Store under both New and Noteworthy and What's Hot, this is fast-paced, arcade style ekranoplan racing action at it's very best. Boasting incredible 3D graphic detail and procedural landscapes never before seen in any game of its type, the game will appeal to lovers of fast-paced, competitive action genres as well as those who prefer something more sedate and relaxing. 14 challenging levels await you with big jumps, steep drops and twisting paths to master. Hunt down your opponents one by one in an attempt to take a medal and unlock the next track or challenge your previous best time in a head to head ghost race. Choose to follow one of the pre-prescribed routes and accumulate boosts by successfully steering through check points, or simply ignore the markers/towers and guidance and choose to explore the road less travelled. Whichever you choose, you're guaranteed a beautiful journey!Features include:* 14 challenging levels* 10 different Ground Effect craft* Stunning terrains (both land and sea)* Free roaming â explore at will* Impressive draw distance * Sensitive and intuitive flight controls * Throttle speed controller* High score recording* Replay & ghost-race modes* Boost control* Day and night scenarios * Driver/1st person camera view* Free-play practice levels* App2sd supportedPlease email us with questions or feedback.

reviews.title: Quick Fun
reviews.comment: Simple and fun. Outstanding tracks, great crashes. I recommend this one!
reviews.author: Brian Nauer

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: This game is great, been playing for a while, and it\'s loads of fun. Had issues when I first brought it, cos it wouldn\'t load, so uninstalled....gave it another try, glad I did. Best flying game there is. I\'d recommend this game!
reviews.author: Trevor Hendricks

reviews.title: Well done
reviews.comment: It\'s the best flight game around for me: it\'s about flying and racing, not shooting. Music is great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Basic racer
reviews.comment: Match racing at its finest. No racing mods, just point and go. Great game!
reviews.author: John Otto

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Really good   get it  its good
reviews.author: Al Dianetti

reviews.title: Overall
reviews.comment: Nice and enjoyable game with beautiful graphics. Surprised its still being updated!

reviews.title: Ground Effect HD
reviews.comment: The game is awesome, the graphics great and it is totally addictive , I love it!!

reviews.title: Marvelous game
reviews.comment: Engaging, immersive and immensely enjoyable experience. Buy this! You wont be dissapointed!
reviews.author: Cameron Mackie

reviews.title: Nice graphics but no weapons
reviews.comment: Nice game for casual \"flying\". The steering could be sharper and the other racers a.i. better.. i\'m somehow missing some action from weapons.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not HD, Not GOOD.
reviews.comment: If this game is in HD, then the cast of the Jersey Shore are Mensa members. There is no way this in HD resolution! The only possible way that it could be in HD, is if the original non-HD version of the game looked so incredibly terrible, that well, its so bad you can\'t even tell a difference with the supposed HD upgrade. I know video games and resolutions well, and man this game looks awful. I\'m assuming the developer is trying to entice more buyers and woo them with the promise of some stunning HD pictures. I think its similar if you tried to make a cartoon like \"Steamboat Willie\" in HD after the fact. Yeah it may have been glossed over with an HD sheen, but its still going to look ancient. And that is this game to a tee, it appears to have come off the Amiga computer.  I can only imagine how much more I\'d feel ripped off if I had purchased the \"XHD\" version, sheesh! This might please some, but for the asking price you could do a lot better with other offerings on the Market. At least play the demo if there is one before you buy this. Just my two cents...HD cents.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great title, fun game
reviews.comment: Great game The 3D works well on my LG P920, looks nice. Needs good techno beats like Wipeout on PS3, and needs some sort of jet sound for the motor.
